hero: I'm a professional game programmer currently specializing in multiplayer prototypes, and I always makes sure that the code that I write is clean, re-usable, and extensible. I also love creating tools that streamline workflows for both myself and my team.
full1: I'm a game developer located in Victoria, BC. I'm currently directing and programming my own multiplayer game, BeetleBall, as well as using my skills to help others in creating their own dream multiplayer games!
full2: I especially love online games because of the emergent possibilities that can arise from different people interacting with each other, and the chaos that can arise. The prototype version of my current game, BeetleBall, was created during a game jam, and it only took three days to develop an silly idea into a fully functional 6v6 online multiplayer game!
